name: TacoAdventure
description:
Welcome to TacoAdventure! Enjoy a dangerous adventure through the desert where the king  El Pinchos and his minions will try to eliminate you! But you don't have to worry! Because you can destroy them throwing tacos!!! Will you accomplish your mission?
 Play as Sombrerito:       ·Ctrl / Click ---> Shoot      ·R ---> Big taco shoot      ·Space ---> Triple taco shoot Who are your enemies?:         ·Calaveras Locas        ·El Pinchos UWU GUEIMS hopes you like it!
